sentence.Network_en: She was wondering if she were not a cold, hard, priggish person.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只是在琢磨,她是不是一个冷酷的, 硬心肠的, 自命不凡的人.

sentence.Network_en: She was wondering if she were not a cold, hard, priggish girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只是在琢磨,她是不是一个冷酷的 、 硬心肠的 、 自命不凡的女孩子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(P) ... priggery 自负 priggish 自负的 priggism 自负.
以 -sh -ish 结尾的英语单词 2续 -... ... waggish 爱开玩笑的, 滑稽的 priggish 自负的, 一本正经的 brackish 有盐味的, 可厌的.
prification 还原型谷胱甘肽, priggish 死板的, prig 扒手
台大视听教育馆英语学习报第007期 ... noxious 有毒的 priggish 自以为的 ingredient 原料，组成元素.

entry.tran: 自命清高的；一本正经的
entry.def: If you describe someone as priggish, you think that they are a prig.

sentences.sentence: "my straitlaced Aunt Anna doesn't approve of my miniskirts"

auth_sentence.content: Yet the movie is not some conventionally priggish tale of youthful innocence corrupted by riches.
